applyXSLToRecordHelp: 引用的XSL转换将被应用于所有添加到Geonetwork中的元数据记录
arcsde-versionHelp: 选择ArcSDE版本。 ArcSDE数据模型因不同版本而异。
arcsde-connection-databaseHelp: 选择ArcSDE使用的数据库。所选数据库的JDBC驱动程序必须安装在GeoNetwork中
arcsde-connectionHelp: 使用ArcSDE进程链接或直接连接到数据库。
vacuum-record: 替换后移除记录中的空要素
batchreplacer-replacementsConfig-help: 定义一个组新的替换项，加载时替换原有替换项。其中要素名称和搜索值可以为正则表达式，例如：'iso19139\..*\.organisationName'将匹配任何所有的organisation name，'dublin-core.simpledc.publisher' 将匹配dublin core publisher。
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.contactInst: 要素目录引文>联系机构
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.hoursOfServ: 要素目录引文>服务时间
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.or.ap: 要素目录引文>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.or.descript: 要素目录引文>在线资源>描述
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.or.name: 要素目录引文>在线资源>名称
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.or.url: 要素目录引文>在线资源>网址
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.organisatio: 要素目录引文>组织名称
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.postalCode: 要素目录引文>邮政编码
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.province: 要素目录引文>行政区域(省)
batchreplacer-el-di.contact.organisation: 分发联系>所属组织名称
batchreplacer-el-di.transferOptions.ap: 数据传输选项>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-di.transferOptions.name: 数据传输选项>名称
batchreplacer-el-id.contact.or.ap: 联系人>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-id.contact.or.name: 联系人>在线资源>名称
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.citation.or.a: 引文>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.poc.or.ap: 联系点>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.poc.or.name: 联系点>在线资源>名称
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.gc.useLi: 资源约束>常规约束>使用限制
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.lc.other: 资源约束>安全约束>使用限制
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.lc.useLi: 资源约束>法律约束>使用限制
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.sc.useLi: 资源约束>常规约束>使用限制
batchreplacer-el-id.serviceid.citation.o: 引文>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-id.serviceid.poc.or.ap: 联系点>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-mi.contact.or.ap: 联系人>在线资源>应用简介
batchreplacer-el-mi.contact.or.name: 联系人>在线资源>名称
cantDeleteGroupHavingRecords: 该组包含记录。将所有记录移动到另一个组，以便将其删除。
cantDeleteUserHavingRecords: 具有记录的用户无法删除。将记录转移给另一个用户。
categoryDescriptionHelp: 在此组中创建元数据的默认类别
chooseFormatter: 选择上传一个格式化程序包
formatterUploadError: 加载格式化程序时发生错误
chooseLogos: 在这里选择或放置图像
chooseSourceEditor: 选择编辑器来传输记录
chooseThesaurus: 在这里选择或删除文件
jsCacheCleared: JS缓存清除。下一页加载将触发缓存构建。
clearJsCacheHelp: 此选项适用于开发人员。当更改Javascript，CSS或Less文件时，2个选项：删除数据目录中的wro4j-cache数据库，重新启动应用程序，或者点击此按钮尝试简单地重新加载模型并缓存。缓存将在下一页加载时被刷新并重新创建。检查 WRO4J模型。
confirmDeleteSchematronCriteria: 您确定要删除条件准则吗？
confirmDeleteSchematronCriteriaGroup: 您确定要删除条件准则组吗？
contact-updater: 联系方式更新（使用电子邮件搜索）
contactAsXML: 用于替换匹配联系人的插入XML片段
enableThesaurusHelp: 在多节点模式下，使用此选项可为该节点启用或禁用词库。
cron-0 0/5 14 * * ?: 每天下午2点开始每5分钟启动，下午2点55分结束
cron-0 15 10 ? * MON-FRI: 星期一，星期二，星期三，星期四，星期五上午10:15启动
csw-capabilitiesUrlHelp: 具有或不具有GetCapabilities参数的CSW URL
csw-record-help: 由CSW服务生成的元数据记录。
csw-rejectDuplicateResource: 根据资源标识符检查重复的资源
csw-rejectDuplicateResourceHelp: 比较'gmd:identificationInfo/*/gmd:citation/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:identifier/*/gmd:code/gco:CharacterString'元素。它仅适用于ISO19139或ISO配置文件中的记录。
noCswCriteriaFoundInCapabilities: 在功能中找不到搜索条件。所有记录将从该服务器收割。
CswCriteriaFoundInCapabilities: （可选）使用以下一个或多个搜索条件来限制记录进行收割。使用'%'通配符来查询使用类似的运算符（即ogc:PropertyIsLike）而不是相等的。
errorRetrievingCswCapabilities: 检索服务功能时发生错误。请检查服务URL或当前状态。
csw-outputSchemaHelp: 要从CSW服务器请求的元数据标准URI标识符。服务器必须支持该标准。支持的标准在“GetRecordById”操作下的CSW功能文档中列出。
customizeElementSetHelp: 定义要包含在您的自定义元素集中的元素。每个元素必须通过文档根目录下的完整XPATH进行标识。这些元素及其子节点将被包含在CSW GetName（使用ElementSetName = FULL）请求的响应中。要恢复默认的ElementSetName = FULL响应，请从此列表中删除所有元素。
defineUserGroupsPerProfile: 为每个配置文件选择用户组
deleteHarvesterHelp: 删除收割器和所有相关记录
assignHarvestedRecordToLocalNode: 将<strong> {{records}} </ strong>记录分配给本地节点
dupNameWarning: 已经有一个具有该名称的组。请更改名字
emptyCatalogShouldBeFilled: 目录为空，您可能需要导入新记录或配置收割器。您还可以插入所有模板，所有示例或 全部。
facetIndicatorHelp: 记录的统计信息是根据缓存配置定义的，只能表示最常见的值。
filesystem-beforeScriptHelp: 可以用来做rsync或类似的事情。如果空，则不运行。
filesystem-checkFileLastModifiedForUpdat: 如果文件更新只更新目录记录
如果文件更新只更新目录记录
filesystem-directoryHelp: 服务器上用于收割的文件路径
filesystem-nodelete: 保留目录记录，即使在源文件中删除
filesystem-nodeleteHelp: 保留目录记录，即使在源文件中删除
filesystem-recurseHelp: 如果为true，则也将在子文件夹中搜索元数据
formatterRemovalError: 删除格式化器时发生错误。
formatterUploadHelp: 格式化器是包含一组自定义元数据布局文件的ZIP压缩包。
formatterCacheHelp: 格式化器负责所有元数据视图。为了提高性能，当请求时，输出值将被缓存。当更新元数据时，缓存将自动更新，但是格式化器本身被修改时，必须清除缓存，以便创建新的输出
formatterCacheCleared: 格式化器缓存值已成功清除
formatCacheClearFailure: 尝试清除格式化器缓存时发生错误
geonetwork-createRemoteCategory: 如果本地存在，请设置类别
geonetwork-createRemoteCategoryHelp: 如果为true，那么在本地也可以使用远程服务器元数据的类别（假设它在本地存在）
geonetwork-customCriteriaHelp: 定义远程节点支持的任何条件准则，并且在预定义过滤器中不可用（例如，对于非模糊搜索，“similarity”设置为“1”）。您可以指定由';'分隔的多个条件准则（例如_schema; siteId值为iso19139; 7fc45be3-9aba-4198-920c-b8737112d522）
geonetwork-hostHelp: URL仅包含目录名称。例如： http://www.fao.org/geonetwork。
geonetwork-useChangeDateForUpdate: 使用更改日期进行比较
geonetwork-useChangeDateForUpdateHelp: 使用更改日期来检测远程服务器上的更改。这不会更新微小的变化，但可以提高收割的速度。
geonetwork-xslfilterHelp: XSL过滤器应用于每个元数据记录
groupEmailHelp: 用于接收通知的电子邮件
groupNameHelp: 组标识符。不要忘记为标签添加翻译。
groupWebsiteHelp: 包含有关该组信息的网站。
chooseOrDropResource: 选择或拖动资源到这里
harvester-arcsdeHelp: 从ArcSDE数据库收集元数据记录。
harvester-geonetwork20Help: 收集GeoNetwork节点2.0或更低版本。请注意，收集旧的GeoNetwork节点是不安全的。旧节点没有唯一的站点ID，这可能会导致不可预测的结果（例如从其他收集中删除节点）。
harvester-oaipmhHelp: 使用OAI元数据收集2.0协议进行收集
harvester-threddsHelp: THREDDS数据服务器（TDS）使用OPeNDAP，OGC WMS和WCS，HTTP和其他远程数据访问协议为科学数据集提供元数据和数据访问Web服务。
harvester-wfsfeaturesHelp: 从WFS要素创建元数据记录或目录条目。
harvesterGroupHelp: 拥有收获记录的组。只有该组的目录管理员或用户管理员才能管理此节点
harvesterOverrideUUIDHelp: When a harvester finds the same uuid on a record collected by another method (another harvester, importer, dashboard editor,...), should this record be skipped, overrided or generate a new UUID?
harvesterValidateHelp: 基于标准验证（即XSD，Schematrons），无效记录将被拒​​绝。
indexingRecordsRelatedToTheThesaurus: 与此词典相关的记录正在索引...
indexInEs: 索引中的远程索引(测试版)
indexInEsHelp: 在一个远程的弹性搜索实例中索引目录内容。
java.vm.name: JVM名称
keywordNotAvailableInThisLanguage: 当前语言中关键字不可用
loadSchemaSamplesOrTemplates: 加载元数据标准样本和模板
logoUploadHelp: 拖放一个或多个图像到此处，以添加到商品目录列表中
ui-bingKey-help: Bing瓦片地图的主机名相关键。你必须获取自己的Key。
metadata/resourceIdentifierPrefix-help: 编辑器提供了自动计算资源标识的能力。该标识符是通过将该前缀与元数据标识符（例如http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/a1fd6bb7-6425-48b6-bca3-13c9e1bc4ab1）连接来计算的。
metadataIdentifierTemplateUpdateError: 保存元数据标识符模板时出错
metadataIdentifierTemplateDeletedError: 删除元数据标识符模板时出错
metadataInternalId: 选择元数据内部标识符
newMetadataIdentifierTemplate: 新的元数据标识符模板
noCommitAvailable: 没有活动记录。启用元数据记录上的版本控制以跟随更改。
oaipmh-FailedToGetSetsAndPrefix: 无法检索集合和前缀。检查服务器URL
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayer: 仅使用GetCapabilities信息为每个层创建记录。
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayerHelp: 仅使用GetCapabilities信息为每个层创建记录。
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayerUsingMe: 使用MetadataURL属性为每个图层创建记录。
ogcwxs-createThumbnailsHelp: 在收获期间，对于每个图层，GetMap请求都是基于图层的边框。只适用于WMS服务。
oneRunOnlyHelp: This harvester will run only once and not schedule in the future.
optimizeIndexHelp: 优化Lucene索引。这是典型的自动运行，但如果出现奇怪的搜索结果可以强制执行。
os.name: 系统名称
processRecommendedOnHostChange-help: 更改目录主机名后，建议更新目录记录中所有可能定义的链接 ( 例如缩略图，上传的文档，XLink ) 。点击此处用{{by}}替换{{old}}
processRecommendedOnPrefixChange-help: 更改标识符前缀后，建议更新所有记录标识符。点击这里配置更新。
recordWithNoTitle: - 没有标题/错误索引的记录 -
rebuildIndexHelp: 重建索引时，搜索可能会返回不完整的结果，CSW GetRecords操作被禁用。目录流量低时使用此功能。建议在重新加载索引配置或直接在数据库中进行更改后重建索引。
reindexRecords-help: 在更新关键字后和记录使用XLinks时，使用该同义词库的记录应该重新索引 ( 由于XLinks缓存系统 ) 。
reloadLuceneConfigHelp: 如果在配置中进行的更改会改变索引结构 ( 例如，修改分析器 ) ，则建议重新构建索引。
reportFileDownloadMetadata-description: 选择条件来提取数据下载历史记录。报告结果可以导入到MS Access和Excel中。
reportFileUploadMetadata-description: 选择标准来提取数据上传历史记录。报告结果可以导入到MS Access和Excel中。
reportInternalMetadata-description: 选择标准来提取内部记录列表和记录所有者的信息。这将允许进行记录审查，以确保记录的完整性，或在必要时删除“空白”或“测试”记录。报告结果可以导入到MS Access和Excel中。
reportInternalMetadata-metadataCreationD: 元数据创建日期 ( 开始 )
元数据创建日期 ( 结束 )
reportUpdatedMetadata-description: This report allows to extract a list of updated records and the record owner’s information for a specified last updated date range for import into Microsoft Access and Excel. This will allow for a review of records to ensure the currency of records or if necessary the deletion of old or expired records. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
reportUpdatedMetadata-metadataChangeDate: 元数据更改日期 ( 开始 )
元数据更改日期 ( 结束 )
reportUsers-description: 选择条件以提取用户名，电子邮件和上次登录日期的列表。报告结果可以导入到MS Access和Excel中。
reportUsers-userLoginDateBegin: 用户登录日期 ( 开始 )
reportUsers-userLoginDateEnd: 用户登录日期 ( 结束 )
requirementDISABLED: 忽略这个组，即使条件匹配，Schematron也不会运行
requirementREPORT_ONLY: 只报告错误，不影响元数据的有效性
schematronDescriptionGeneric: 当元数据的 '{{type}}'为“{{value}}”时，此条件通过
schematronInfo: 选定的Schematron将在以下组中所有元数据的条件被评估为true时被用于验证元数据。
standardLoadHelp: 为了更新现有的标准使用它的标识符。
standardRecordUUID: UUID of local metadata record with GeoNetwork Metadata Schema Archive (URL) as online resource
system/ui/defaultView: 选择要使用的用户界面
system/autodetect/enable: 启用自动检测搜索请求语言
system/autodetect/enable-help: If set, the search language is automatically detected. Note that this doesn't work very well for short search terms.
system/cors/allowedHosts-help: CORS could be configured using CORSResponseFilter allowedHosts parameters in WEB-INF/web.xml. If this parameter is set to 'db'. Then this setting apply, if not, this setting is ignored. Comma separated list of allowed hosts for which CORS headers are added. Use '*' to allow to all. Use '' to disable CORS. More details about CORS here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-origin_resource_sharing.
system/autofixing/enable-help: When enabled, GeoNetwork automatically applies certain fixes when you save metadata (eg. last update date). Don't disable this option unless you know what you're doing (ie. update-fixed-info.xsl will not be applied anymore if disabled).
system/clickablehyperlinks/enable-help: 一旦被设置，地理网络 将在元数据中显示可点击的超链接。
system/csw/contactId-help: Choose the contact to be added to the GetCapabilities request. Create a custom user in the user management page if needed.
system/csw/enabledWhenIndexing: 即使正在索引目录，也启用CSW
system/csw/enabledWhenIndexing-help: This is usually recommended. If not, when the catalog is indexing (eg. during editing, harvesting, actions on selection), CSW GetRecords operation response will return an exception. A reason to disable CSW during indexing is to avoid to have the catalog returning incomplete responses due to not completely up to date index.
system/csw/enable-help: Enable CSW and all virtual CSW services. When not enable, an exception is returned.
system/csw/metadataPublic: 插入的元数据是公开的
system/csw/metadataPublic-help: When a transation insert a new record via the CSW-T protocol, automatically publish the record to all users.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath: Create element if it does not exist when using XPath in CSW trasaction.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath-: 如果不选中，只有现有的元素可以更新。
system/downloadservice/leave: Use metadata linkage as is - no changes to linkage
system/downloadservice/leave-help: Selecting this option means that GeoNetwork will not handle file downloads.
system/downloadservice/simple: Use GeoNetwork simple file download service (resources.get)
system/downloadservice/simple-help: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork with no further user input - it is the simplest download interface
system/downloadservice/withdisclaimer: Use GeoNetwork disclaimer and constraints service (file.disclaimer)
system/downloadservice/withdisclaimer-he: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork after they have agreed to accept any metadata constraints/generic disclaimer. The resource is bundled into a zip archive with an html description of the metadata constraints and a snapshot of the metadata record (as a MEF).
system/feedback/email-help: 这是用于发送反馈的管理员的电子邮件地址。
system/feedback/mailServer/host-help: The SMTP host and port parameters are used to send emails to GeoNetwork's users when a resource is downloaded.
system/feedback/mailServer/ignoreSslCert: 忽略由邮件服务器的SSL证书引起的错误
system/harvesting/mail/template-help: You can use the following strings on both template and subject. They will be replaced by the actual value. Total number of metadata imported: $$total$$. Number of metadata added: $$added$$. Number of metadata updated: $$updated$$. Number of metadata unchanged: $$unchanged$$. Number of metadata unretrievable: $$unretrievable$$. Number of metadata removed: $$removed$$. How many metadata does not validate: $$doesNotValidate$$. Harvester Name: $$harvesterName$$. Harvester Type: $$harvesterType$$. Error Message: $$errorMsg$$
system/hidewithheldelements: Metadata / ISO19139 / Nil reason attribute with held
system/inspire/enable-help: Enable INSPIRE CSW (ie. language support and INSPIRE GetCapabilities document) and INSPIRE indexing. INSPIRE themes thesaurus MUST be installed to properly index themes and annexes. Note: It does not enable the INSPIRE editor view mode (see iso19139/layout/config-editor.xml).
system/intranet/network-help: The network and netmask parameters are used to identify internal connections to GeoNetwork, that is, to identify the intranet group.
system/localrating/enable-help: If set, GeoNetwork will calculate user ratings for metadata from this node only (not distributed among other GeoNetwork nodes).
system/metadata/validation/removeSchemaL: If true, the schemaLocation attribute in root element of the metadata is removed during validation and on metadata save. It ensures that the schemaLocation used for the metadata is always the local schema one
system/metadata/allThesaurus-help: If true then a virtual thesaurus will be created that contains all keywords in all other thesauri.  This is useful in editor when the name of the thesaurus is unimportant and only the keyword is important.  In order to ensure that the correct keyword blocks are maintained (with correct thesaurus name) enabling this will also enable a transform in update-fixed-info that will assign the keyword in the 'all' thesaurus to keyword blocks with the correct thesaurus for the keyword
system/metadatacreate/generateUuid-help: GeoNetwork creates assigns a random metadata UUID to the metadata created by a user (default). To assign the metadata UUID manually disable this option and fill the metadata UUID prefix.
system/oai/cachesize-help: The number of OAI resultSets that can be stored in the Cache.
system/oai/mdmode-help: Influences the behaviour of OAI when parameters from or until are supplied. If set to temporal extent, the temporal extent of the date described by the metadata is searched. If set to modification date, the date at which the metadata was last modified is searched. Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
system/oai/tokentimeout-help: The number of seconds a OAI resultset stays in the cache and can be scrolled using the OAI resumptionToken Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
system/oai/maxrecords-help: Number of maximum records to return in OAI responses
system/proxy/host-help: If set, GeoNetwork will use the provided proxy parameters when accessing remote nodes. For example, this is used during the harvesting.
system/proxy/ignorehostlist-help: To bypass specific hosts enter a specific IP address or host name such as www.mydomain.com or an address range using wildcards, such as 192.168.2.*. Use | to separate the different host values.
system/requestedLanguage/ignorechars: Characters to ignore when analyzing text
system/requestedLanguage/ignored: Ignore requested language for search results.
system/requestedLanguage/only-value1: All documents in all languages (No preferences)
system/requestedLanguage/only-value2: Prefer documents with translations requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value3: Prefer documents whose language is the requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value5: Document language is the requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value6: Prefer documents having translations in the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value7: Only documents having translations in the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value8: Prefer documents having the same language as the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value9: Only documents having the same language as the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/preferUiLanguag: If auto detect search language is enabled enabling this will ensure that the metadata loaded will still have the translations provided in the UI Language when possible. If disabled then the translations will be in the detected search language.
system/requestedLanguage/sorted: Search results in requested language sorted on top
system/searchStats/enable-help: If set, Statistics on searches will be collected and stored in the database.
system/server/host-help: The server's host and port are used to create URLs to the GeoNetwork server. For example, they are used during metadata editing to create resource links and when returning the server's capabilities during a CS/W request.
system/site/name-help: The name displayed in different places (eg. news feed).
system/site/siteId-help: Unique catalogue identifier. After changing the site identifier, user should update the index and the logo from the administration panel.
system/userSelfRegistration/enable-help: When enabled, make sure a mail server is also configured.
system/userFeedback/enable-help: When enabled, make sure a mail server is also configured.
system/xlinkResolver/enable-help: If set, XLinks to metadata fragments in records will be resolved.
system/xlinkResolver/localXlinkEnable-he: Local XLinks are using local://<lang>/<service> URL to make references to related sections instead of HTTP URL. Local XLinks are usually faster than HTTP XLinks.
system/xlinkResolver/ignore: Elements to ignore by XLink resolution
system/xlinkResolver/ignore-help: Comma separated list of elements to ignore by XLink resolution
metadata/workflow/automaticUnpublishInva: 无效的元数据自动不更新
自动取消发布编辑后根据XSD或Schematron规则变得无效的元数据。
metadata/workflow/allowPublishInvalidMd: 允许发布无效的元数据
metadata/workflow/allowPublishInvalidMd-: 允许发布根据XSD或Schematron规则无效的元数据。
metadata/workflow/draftWhenInGroup: 启用以下组中工作流程
metadata/workflow/draftWhenInGroup-help: Regular expression for matching groups where record needs to be set with draft status automatically. eg. MYOCEAN-.* to match all groups starting with MYOCEAN-, GROUP1|GROUP2 to match GROUP1 or GROUP2 or .* to match all.
metadata/workflow/forceValidationOnMdSav: When the metadata is saved force validation check
metadata/import/restrict-help: List of all allowed schemas for metadata to be imported. If the metadata schema is not allowed, then the import is not done. No value means all schemas allowed.
thesaurusExternalHelp: External thesauri are in read only mode.
thesaurusPlaceHelp: Thesauri of type place contain bounding boxes of each concept. They could be used to automatically compute record extent from keywords.
thesaurusUploadHelp: Thesauri in SKOS format are supported. File could have xml or rdf extensions.
thredds-DIF: Extract DIF metadata elements and create ISO metadata
thredds-UNIDATA: Extract Unidata dataset discovery metadata using fragments
thredds-createAtomicSubtemplates: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createAtomicSubtemplatesHelp: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createCollectionSubtemplates: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createCollectionSubtemplatesHelp: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createServiceMd: Create ISO19119 metadata for all services in the catalog
thredds-createServiceMdHelp: Create ISO19119 metadata for all services in the catalog
thredds-createThumbnails: Create thumbnails for any datasets delivered by WMS
thredds-createThumbnailsHelp: Create thumbnails for any datasets delivered by WMS
thredds-outputSchemaOnAtomicsDIF: Select schema for output metadata records
thredds-outputSchemaOnCollections: Select schema for output metadata records
thredds-templateId: Select template to combine with fragments
thredds-templateIdHelp: Select template to combine with fragments
totalNumberOfRecordsHelp: Total number of records visible to you.
searchesWithNoHits: Total number of searches with no result
typeOfServiceUsed: Type of services used for search
aReviewerInAGroupIsAlsoAnEditor: A reviewer in a group will also be set editor of this group
useLogoForCatalogFavicon: 把它用作节点喜欢的图标
virtualCSWExplicitQueryHelp:
任意的lucene查询字符串将被添加到从下面的参数构成的查询。
警告：只有高级用户。
wfsfeatures-createSubtemplatesHelp: 为每个WFS要素创建子模板
wfsfeatures-queryHelp: 用于获取要素的WFS GetFeature查询
wfsfeatures-streamFeatures: 把大的响应保存到磁盘
wfsfeatures-streamFeaturesHelp: If the response is large response, save it to disk instead of keeping the response in memory
wfsfeatures-stylesheetHelp: The stylesheet to apply to each feature for creating the metadata from each feature
wfsfeatures-templateId: Select template to combine with fragments
wfsfeatures-templateIdHelp: Select template to combine with fragments
workspace-help: 与工作空间所关联的命名空间前缀和URL也要发布
xlinkCacheHelp: XLink cache to insert directory entries in metadata records. When updating directories, it may be needed to clear the cache of XLink in case the entries are not updated in related records.
XSDVALIDATION: Accept metadata that are XSD Valid
SCHEMATRONVALIDATION: Accept metadata that are XSD and Schematron Valid
profileUpdatedFailed: 无法更新系统配置文件
GNIDX-GEOWRITE: 写入错误几何图形空间索引
GNIDX-BADNUMVALUE: 错误Lucene索引值转换为数字
unsavedChangesWarning:
您有未保存的更改

你确定要离开页面并丢失所做的更改？
region/getmap/background: Background map, URL or Named Layer ID
metadata/backuparchive/enable-help: Activate nightly backup archive on server. Add a download archive button in admin/tools interface.
downloadBackupArchiveHelp: Download a MEF file containing all inner metadatas of the catalog (non harvested including templates).
APIHelp: Documentation and testing page for the GeoNetwork API. Learn how to use the REST API.
triggerBackupArchiveHelp: Backup archive are done nightly but you can trigger it manually.
generatingArchiveBackup: The generation of backup archive have started.
ui/config-help: Configure here the search application. Define main options of the layout and modules of the search interface.
ui-facetTabField: Facet field to display using tabs
ui-facetTabField-help: Tab field is displayed above search results.
ui-filters-help: Add extra filters to add to any search queries. It is recommended to avoid to set a filter on an existing form field.
ui-languages-help: Define the list of language in the language selector
ui-paginationInfo: Default number of records per page
ui-facetsSummaryType-help: List of facet is defined on the config-summary.xml file but user can select different set of facets. Default is 'details'. Other options: 'manager'.
ui-resultViewTpls: List of templates for search results
ui-resultTemplate: Default template used for search results
ui-formatter: List of formatter for record view
ui-projectionList: List of map projection to display bounding box coordinates into
ui-facetConfig-help: List index field name to be displayed in the facetted search. The field MUST also be in the type of facet fields set.
ui-listOfServices-help: If none defined, service metadata records are proposed to the users
ui-storage-help: '' or 'sessionStorage' or 'localStorage'. An empty value means that the viewer map will not be saved when leaving the application and restored when coming back.
ui-isExportMapAsImageEnabled-help: This requires CORS to be enabled on the WMS services used in the map application. If not sure, you should disable that option that may cause trouble displaying WMS layers.
ui-is3DModeAllowed-help: If enabled, user can switch the map to 3D mode. The map viewer need to be enabled also. If you don't want to enable the 3D mode for all users, adding 'catalog.search?with3d' in the URL will also load 3D mode.
ui-isUserRecordsOnly-help: If enabled, the checkbox "Only my records" will be ckecked by default in the editor dashboard
ui-isFilterTagsDisplayed-help: If enabled display the list of filters applied in the dashboard and the batch editor dashboard
ui-isFilterTagsDisplayedInSearch: Display filter tags in the search results
ui-isFilterTagsDisplayedInSearch-help: If enabled display the list of filters applied in the search results page
map/isMapViewerEnabled-help: If unselected, the map tab will be disabled and will not be used.
ui-isSaveMapInCatalogAllowed: Allow users to save maps as metadata record
ui-isSaveMapInCatalogAllowed-help: From the map viewer, user can set the map title and abstract and save the map directly with the OWS context in the catalog as a metadata record.
ui-searchMapLayers-help: Optional. Define here layers that will be used in the search map. Type can be: wmts, osm, bing_aerial, stamen, etc.
ui-viewerMapLayers-help: Optional. Define here background layers to add on top of layers in the default map context.
ui-disabledTools-help: You can decide to show or hide these tools in the map viewer. Selected tools will be shown to the users.
ui-graticuleOgcService: OGC Service to use as graticule
ui-graticuleOgcService-help: Optional. For now, only WMS services are supported.
confirmDeleteThesaurus: Are you sure you want to delete this thesaurus?
confirmDeleteKeyword: Are you sure you want to delete this keyword?
oneLanguage-help: Choose one language to edit using the selector
ui-mapExtent-help: DEPRECATED! Extent coordinates to use for maps other that viewer and search maps.
ui-mapBackgroundLayer-help: DEPRECATED! Define here the background layer to use for maps other that viewer and search maps.
ui-map-viewer-help: This configuration is used for the viewer map. Every parameter is optional. The context is applied first, then the extent and layers. Supported types are: osm, bing_aerial, stamen, wmts, wms.
ui-map-search-help: This configuration is used for the search map. Every parameter is optional. The context is applied first, then the extent and layers. Supported types are: osm, bing_aerial, stamen, wmts, wms.
ui-map-editor-help: This configuration is used for the editor maps (bounding box and geometry editor). Every parameter is optional. The context is applied first, then the extent and layers. Supported types are: osm, bing_aerial, stamen, wmts, wms.
system/xlinkResolver/referencedDeletionA: Allow deletion of subtemplates referenced through an xlink.
gridConfigRelatedTypes-help: Possible types include children, parent, services, fcats, datasets, sibling.
gnCssStyleIntroMessage: Properties defined here replace the default system properties. An empty field restores the corresponding default value.
wfsIndexingSubtitle: Here are listed the ongoing and finished jobs for indexing features from remote WFS services. Once indexed, features can then be filtered according to their attributes and the filter applied to the original map layer.
wfsIndexingRefreshError: An error occurred when refreshing the list:
